name: Splat (Buck Wild Games)
description:
Make your way through this colourful puzzle game, painting your way to the goal. Made for the Mini Jam: 111, Theme: Colours, Limitation: You are your own enemy.

Controls:

WASD or Arrow keys to move.

Mouse to aim.

Left click to shoot.

Right click to drop.

R to restart.

Esc to quit.
